description: Example value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.
name: ConditionStage

text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 385356007 (Tumour stage finding)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 431855005 (Chronic kidney disease stage 1)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 431856006 (Chronic kidney disease stage 2)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 433144002 (Chronic kidney disease stage 3)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 431857002 (Chronic kidney disease stage 4)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 433146000 (Chronic kidney disease stage 5)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 408847006 (Retinopathy of prematurity stage 1 - demarcation line)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 408848001 (Retinopathy of prematurity stage 2 - intraretinal ridge)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 408849009 (Retinopathy of prematurity stage 3 - ridge with extraretinal fibrovascular proliferation)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 408850009 (Retinopathy of prematurity stage 4 - subtotal retinal detachment)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 408851008 (Retinopathy of prematurity stage 5 - total retinal detachment)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    416780008Primary degenerative dementia of the Alzheimer type, presenile onset (disorder)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    715345007Young onset Parkinson disease (disorder)

title: Condition Stage
